meta.title: Dimas Rizky Maulana | Web Frontend & Backend | UI/UX Designer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing web development and UI/UX design work

about.bio: Highly motivated Computer Engineering student with a strong foundation in Web Frontend Development and UI/UX Design, backed by 4 competition wins in web design and UI/UX. Skilled in creating intuitive, user-centered, and responsive solutions that enhance user experiences. Proficient in modern web technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, and React.js. Passionate about delivering high-quality digital products and experiences, supported by a portfolio showcasing innovative projects. Experienced in collaborating effectively with teams and contributing to the development of impactful web applications.

positions.title: Frontend Engineer
description: Developed frontend code for his client's

positions.title: Frontend Designer
description: Developed frontend code for product ads, improving user interaction and enhancing ads visibility on the platform.

Contributed to the development of websites, including Detik Awards, Tapal Batas, DStory, Ad Marketdata Pegadaian Campaign, Ads Sales Product, and Detik Ads catalog, successfully completing 100% of tasks on time.
Initiated the DetikAds catalog project for tracking and reporting ad catalogs, overseeing all stages from PRD, UI/UX design, ERD, prototyping, Laravel development, QA testing, to deployment.

experience.company: Sekolah Tinggi Ilmu Komputer Poltek Cirebon

positions.title: Lead Computer Lab Assistant
description: Promoted to lead role managing computer lab practicals for Web Design and Web Programming courses.
Provided technical guidance, assisted with grading assignments, and supported over 80 students each semester.

positions.title: Computer Lab Assistant
description: Assisted the instructor in managing computer lab practicals for Web Design and Web Programming courses, providing technical guidance to approximately 10–35 students per session.
Offered support to students in understanding course material, troubleshooting issues, and ensuring smooth practical sessions.

positions.title: Web Frontend & UI/UX Designer
description: Designed UI/UX for E-Learning Adinusa.id and Backoffice Adinusa, including defining website purpose, conducting user research, wireframing, creating visual design system, and prototyping.
Converted finalized designs into responsive web frontend templates using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TailwindCSS, and Bootstrap.
Performed usability testing and refined designs based on feedback.

positions.title: Web Frontend & UI/UX Designer Intern
description: Redesigned the E-Learning Adinusa.id dashboard and backoffice platform to improve user experience.
Created design systems, components, and variants following atomic design principles.
